DBListingQuery.Query: select DATNAME as Name from SYSTEM.._T_DATABASE Where DATNAME NOT IN ('MASTER_DB','SYSTEM')

DBListingQuery.Query: select name from sys.databases where name not in ('master','tempdb','stagedb', 'msdb', 'model', 'ReportServer$%');

DBListingQuery.VersionFrom: Microsoft SQL Azure (RTM) - 11.0.2000.8   Nov  2 2018 21:17:06   Copyright (C) 2018 Microsoft Corporation
DBListingQuery.VersionTo: Microsoft SQL Azure (RTM) - 99.0.2000.8   Nov  2 2018 21:17:06   Copyright (C) 2018 Microsoft Corporation
DBListingQuery.Query: select name from sys.databases where name not in ('master','tempdb','stagedb', 'msdb', 'model', 'ReportServer$%')

TableListingQuery.VersionFrom: Microsoft Parallel Data Warehouse - 1.0.8727.0 (X64) May 8 2018 15:51:34 Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation Parallel Data Warehouse (64-bit) on Windows NT 6.2 <X64> (Build 9200: )
TableListingQuery.VersionTo: Microsoft Parallel Data Warehouse - 99.0.8727.0 (X64) May 8 2018 15:51:34 Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation Parallel Data Warehouse (64-bit) on Windows NT 6.2 <X64> (Build 9200: )
TableListingQuery.Query: use [@DBname];Select t.name as name, s.name as SchemaName from sys.tables t join sys.schemas as s on t.schema_id = s.schema_id and t.object_id not in (select object_id from sys.external_tables) order by t.name;

TableListingQuery.VersionFrom: Microsoft SQL Azure (RTM) - 11.0.2000.8   Nov  2 2018 21:17:06   Copyright (C) 2018 Microsoft Corporation
TableListingQuery.VersionTo: Microsoft SQL Azure (RTM) - 99.0.2000.8   Nov  2 2018 21:17:06   Copyright (C) 2018 Microsoft Corporation
TableListingQuery.Query: select t.name as name, s.name as SchemaName, t.is_external from sys.tables t join sys.schemas as s on t.schema_id = s.schema_id order by t.name;
